source.name: Monthly Weather Observations (Form 1001)
source.description: Monthly Weather Observations ( Form 1001)  is a set of historical manuscript records for the period 1893-1948.  The major parameters in these records: station and sea level pressure; dry bulb, wet bulb, and dewpoint temperature; humidity; winds; precipitation; snowfall and snow depth; clouds; and weather.  These highly detailed observations range from 2-4  times daily.
